function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adoption of new therapeutics and vaccines","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases and prolonged pandemic","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness on the importance of vaccination, implement vaccination drives, and provide easy access to vaccines","Technologies":"Vaccine development and distribution technologies","People":"General population, especially vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Misinformation from untrusted sources","Impact":"Confusion, distrust, and reluctance to adopt preventive measures","Mitigation":"Promote reliable sources of information, fact-checking, and transparency in communication","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, information verification platforms","People":"General population, particularly those relying on untrusted sources","Owner":"Trusted institutions, government agencies, media organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to protect vulnerable populations","Impact":"Higher morbidity and mortality rates among vulnerable individuals","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support programs, improve healthcare access, and prioritize public health measures for vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure and access improvement technologies","People":"Vulnerable individuals with preexisting conditions, the unemployed, and the indigent","Owner":"Government agencies, social support organizations"}]}
